titleStmt.title: A catalogue of such testimonies in all ages as plainly evidence bishops and presbyters to be both one, equall and the same ... with a briefe answer to the objections out of antiquity, that seeme to the contrary.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Prynne by C.A. Briggs; in a marginal note on p. [9], the author refers to his The unbishoping of Timothy and Titus.
This seems to be a reissue of the 1637 ed. (STC 4788) with "The epistle to the reader" (p. [3]-[18]) added and the two final digits of the date erased from t.p. and "41" substituted in pen-and-ink.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
